title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1964/96 of 11 October 1996 fixing the intervention thresholds for oranges, mandarins, satsumas and clementines for the 1996/97 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1964/96 of 11 October 1996 fixing the intervention thresholds for oranges, mandarins, satsumas and clementines for the 1996/97 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The intervention thresholds for oranges, mandarins, satsumas and clementines for the 1996/97 marketing year shall be as follows:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 October 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 132, 16. 6. 1995, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 198, 26. 7. 1988, p. 9.
(4) OJ No L 128, 13. 6. 1995, p. 8.
(5) OJ No L 279, 12. 11. 1993, p. 17.
